SELECT tsdbs.id id, tsdbs.name name, tsdbs.ip_address ipAddress, tsdbs.port port, tsdbs.username username, tsdbs.password password, tsdbs.type type, tsdbs.driver_class_name driverClassName, tsdbs.remark remark, tsdbs.create_by createBy, tsdbs.create_time createTime, tsdbs.update_by updateBy, tsdbs.update_time updateTime FROM t_st_db_data_source tsdbs WHERE tsdbs.is_valid=1
AND tsdbs.name LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{filter.name} , '%' )
ORDER BY tsdbs.id DESC

SELECT tsdbs.id id, tsdbs.name name, tsdbs.ip_address ipAddress, tsdbs.port port, tsdbs.username username, tsdbs.password password, tsdbs.type type, tsdbs.driver_class_name driverClassName, tsdbs.remark remark FROM t_st_db_data_source tsdbs WHERE tsdbs.is_valid=1 AND tsdbs.id = #{id}
